SENT.plain: Dural venous sinus thrombosis is a rare and potentially devastating disease
Several predisposing factors exist, including oral contraceptive therapy and colitis
First-line therapy consists of systemic anticoagulation
If first-line therapies fail, more aggressive endovascular therapies may be performed
We report our initial experience with the Solitaire FR device for treatment of refractory symptomatic dural venous sinus thrombosis
